title: Is it mandatory to rinse nose and mouth during ghusl? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: in that abdullah from canada says if i am making russell and i'm not following the sunnah in the russell it's to uplift the major impurity is it recommended or a must to turn the water in my mouth and sniff water up my nostrils and blow it no it the most authentic opinion is that this is mandatory so your russell would be valid and your wood would be valid as well second
